Spirited Away
2001 125 mins
  • Animation
  • Adventure
  • Family

Spirited Away (Japanese: 千と千尋の神隠し, Hepburn: Sen to Chihiro no Kamikakushi, lit.'Sen and Chihiro's Spiriting Away') tells the story of Chihiro Ogino, a ten-year-old girl who, while moving to a new neighborhood, enters the world of Kami (spirits of Japanese Shinto folklore).

8.6
